Title: Prohibits consumer reporting agencies from requiring or requesting certain consumer information
Summary: Relates to prohibiting consumer reporting agencies from requiring or requesting a copy of a consumer's social security card when furnishing consumer reports or investigative consumer reports to third parties.
LawCode: Amd §380-a, rel §380-v to be §380-w, add §380-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting consumer reporting agencies from requiring or requesting certain consumer information
